Create a Lead Generation Chatbot In 2 minutes

BotPenguin is there for your website or social media like WhatsApp, Facebook, IG, Telegram, etc., in just a line of code.
Collect Customer Contact Details Easily
It's easy to use. Get leads like a pro while BotPenguin engages customers with its interactive texts.
Identify Questions Users Dislike
Get a deeper insight into the questions that put the customer off. Update the FAQs database accordingly and make your bot smarter.
Monitor Usage Trends
Running different bots in different countries and geographies. Know your markets by setting up BotPenguin in different countries and comparing the data. Sort of A/B testing, but better.
